<h3 id="X38037">X(38037) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(4), X(9)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-2*(b+c)*a^5-(b^2-6*b*c+c^2)*a^4+4*(b^3+c^3)*a^3-(b-c)^4*a^2-2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38037) = X(4)+2*X(1001) = 4*X(5)-X(2550) = 3*X(5)-X(38170) = X(9)+2*X(946) = X(40)-4*X(6666) = 2*X(142)-5*X(8227) = 2*X(142)+X(11372) = X(390)+5*X(3091) = 3*X(2550)-4*X(38170) = 3*X(3817)-X(38151) = 3*X(7988)+X(24644) = 3*X(7988)-X(38052) = 5*X(8227)+X(11372) = 3*X(38025)-2*X(38031) = 3*X(38025)-4*X(38043) = 3*X(38057)-2*X(38126) = 3*X(38057)-4*X(38179) = 3*X(38108)-X(38126) = 3*X(38108)-2*X(38179) = 3*X(38150)-2*X(38151)</b>
<p>X(38037) lies on these lines: {1,5809}, {2,165}, {4,1001}, {5,2550}, {7,90}, {9,946}, {20,5259}, {30,38025}, {40,6666}, {142,6847}, {144,10527}, {238,3332}, {390,1479}, {443,7958}, {480,5082}, {497,954}, {499,4312}, {517,38057}, {518,5603}, {519,38075}, {527,38021}, {528,3545}, {631,11495}, {673,36662}, {938,12617}, {952,38139}, {962,6886}, {971,5886}, {990,16020}, {1125,5732}, {1210,12560}, {1385,31672}, {1445,4295}, {1503,38048}, {1709,9776}, {1890,3089}, {2801,11038}, {2829,38060}, {2951,3624}, {3090,3826}, {3243,13464}, {3254,16174}, {3475,5927}, {3485,5728}, {3487,5572}, {3616,36991}, {3855,10786}, {4026,36682}, {4293,6912}, {4294,6835}, {4326,13411}, {4423,7965}, {5055,38121}, {5068,5552}, {5219,10384}, {5223,11522}, {5263,36660}, {5284,10431}, {5542,14986}, {5584,17552}, {5587,5853}, {5686,5692}, {5698,5805}, {5726,19925}, {5735,26363}, {5759,6832}, {5762,38034}, {5777,15185}, {5779,18493}, {5832,22835}, {5840,6826}, {5842,38061}, {5856,38038}, {5857,38039}, {5880,6833}, {5942,10004}, {6594,14217}, {6825,18482}, {6828,7678}, {6843,26333}, {6855,7681}, {6861,31671}, {6864,11496}, {6873,10598}, {6887,12699}, {6888,37524}, {6908,18483}, {6915,7676}, {6926,20195}, {6935,21154}, {6939,7680}, {6945,7679}, {6953,30332}, {6957,10590}, {6989,22793}, {6990,10531}, {7080,7989}, {7402,16593}, {7982,24393}, {8581,11376}, {8727,26105}, {9612,12573}, {9856,28629}, {10157,25568}, {10175,38200}, {10198,12571}, {10442,19863}, {10443,19858}, {10785,16112}, {11025,12528}, {11036,20116}, {11230,38122}, {11375,14100}, {12701,15837}, {12756,34790}, {12848,18393}, {15298,30384}, {15587,25681}, {15726,21151}, {28174,38113}, {28194,38130}, {28198,38067}, {28534,38073}, {31394,36670}, {38093,38123}, {38107,38205}</p>
<p>
X(38037) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {5603, 5817}, {24644, 38052}<br>
X(38037) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (21153, 38059), (38031, 38043), (38053, 5886), (38057, 38108), (38122, 11230), (38126, 38179), (38150, 3817), (38154, 38158), (38200, 10175), (38204, 10171)<br>
X(38037) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (499, 4312, 8732), (946, 6846, 19843), (962, 6886, 19855), (3090, 35514, 3826), (5779, 18493, 20330), (7988, 24644, 38052), (8227, 11372, 142), (12047, 15299, 7), (16112, 25557, 36996), (38031, 38043, 38025), (38075, 38154, 38158), (38108, 38126, 38179), (38126, 38179, 38057), (38159, 38160, 38139)<br>
